sentence.Network_en: Wheresoever the carcase is, there will the ravens be gathered together.
sentence.Network_cn: 哪里有死尸, 哪里就有乌鸦麇集.

sentence.Network_en: I am Robin Hood, as thy caitiff carcase soon shall know. "
sentence.Network_cn: 我乃罗宾汉是也, 你这匹夫马上就会知道我的厉害. ”

sentence.Network_en: We saw a vulture gorging on some rotting carcase.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们看见一只秃鹫正在贪婪地啄食腐尸.
